means: 修改，更改( modify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The vehicles have been modified to suit conditions in the desert.
sentence.Network_cn: 车辆已改装过以适应沙漠的环境。

sentence.Network_en: Top supermarkets are to ban many genetically modified foods.
sentence.Network_cn: 大品牌超市即将下架许多转基因食品。

sentence.Network_en: The plane was a modified version of the C-130.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种飞机是C-130的改进机型。

entry.def: If you modify something, you change it slightly, usually in order to improve it.

example.ex: The club members did agree to modify their recruitment policy...
example.tran: 俱乐部成员的确同意修改吸纳新成员的政策。

example.ex: The plane was a modified version of the C-130.
example.tran: 这种飞机是C-130的改进机型。

entry.def: A word or group of words that modifies another word describes or classifies something, or restricts the meaning of the word.

example.ex: It is a rule of English that adjectives generally precede the noun they modify: we say 'a good cry', not 'a cry good'.
example.tran: 英语规定形容词通常放在其修饰的名词前：我们说 a good cry，不说 a cry good。

sentences.sentence: "their modified stand made the issue more acceptable"
"the performance of the modified aircraft was much improved"

auth_sentence.content: Theories may be modified as new information is gained.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theories may be modified as new information is gained.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theories may be modified as new information is gained.

auth_sentence.content: It becomes a splintered platform of slightly modified versions.
auth_sentence.res_content: It becomes a splintered platform of slightly modified versions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It becomes a splintered platform of slightly modified versions.

auth_sentence.content: To boost production, he uses genetically modified seeds.
auth_sentence.res_content: To boost production, he uses genetically modified seeds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To boost production, he uses genetically modified seeds.

Sentence.sentence: But Monsanto, the agricultural giant, insists it has a patent on the kind of genetically modified seeds Bowman used―and that the patent continues to all of the progeny (后代)of those seeds.
They argue that when a company like Monsanto goes to great expense to create a valuable new genetically modified seed, it must be able to protect its property interests
He used genetically modified seeds to feed his cattle.
